lines: 1. Nanchir' eng'an' ya Nyasae,Kende tigekoribuaRikonyoroki' obomenyo,Rintebia ntame korw' abe.
2. 'Mang'an' amay' anyorokia,'Monene, one ntarochiKorw' as'ore negeire,'Mogok' okoretwa nere.
3. Nobe ribaga Riay' aa,Ontebi' obwanchani Bwaye,Ningosome n'okwegena,Nsang' omogok' o Igoro.
4. 'Me yao nao nkonyora,'mwando bw'Omotongi one'S' enibo y'obong'aini ere,Goichori' ebirengererio.
5. Karu' amasase arabi' ense,Andae im' omosunteMorek' enkoro emwamu,Tinsira korwa as'ore.
